page.title: 11Our Town Band
page.content: Exmouth has its own town band and also a training band where youngsters go on Monday nights to learn to play in the band. We have clarinets, flutes and a brass section. The town band often plays at summer fetes and local functions and sometimes the training band plays before the town band. Recently the Marine Camp donated a GOLD cornet worth about 200 pounds to the band. Band lasts for an hour and we play a selection of marches and waltzes as well as other tunes. There are 6 people from Marpool School that go to the training band and we think SOMETIMES we enjoy it.
